fullplot: Eddie Luca is the youngest son in a family of Italian immigrants who has moved to London. Beginning from nowhere, they open a cafè in an Italian neighborhood. One day their father loses the cafè, the home and his wedding ring by gambling.

title: Queen of Hearts
